description:
After a hypnotized Ash weaken the Exeggutor in the nearby forest Melvin proceeded to capture them.
Then, after Jessie and James tied Melvin up, Melvin`s first Exeggcute evolved and tried to protect him.
After becoming confused all of Melvin`s Exeggutor charged towards the carnival and it was Ash and his Charmander who stopped them.
name: Nassy (McGee)
